text:
I figured it out. I was trying to display default field values. In order for the values to display on the listing page, I had to update the post and delete the default fields and then re enter them. This must "attach the data" to the post.

<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CFPRTEGTX/p1635259613029900?thread_ts=1635238134.024100&cid=CFPRTEGTX>

Hi - I'm new. Going through the developer onboarding training vids. Wondering... if I'm creating a "brand new theme" - can this be accomplished within the built-in developer tools, or is this only done on the command line like the instructor is demonstrating with (for example) `HubSpot/create-cms-project demo` ?
